body_html:
Code looks reasonable to me. Thanks!

I think for the tests you proposed, 1 looks good. It might be hard to do a convergence test for 2. How about just test that _u has correct length? :)

body:
Code looks reasonable to me. Thanks! 

I think for the tests you proposed, 1 looks good. It might be hard to do a convergence test for 2. How about just test that `_u` has correct length? :)
